title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8108.00 - General
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8108.00 - General

State Regulations
(a) Route 12. The
northbound and southbound roadways of Route 12, between Route 990L and Route
220, a distance of 7.5+- miles in the City of Norwich, Towns of Preston, Norwich, Oxford and the Village of Oxford. (b) Route 220. The eastbound and westbound
roadways of Route 220, between Route 12 and CR 35, a distance of 0.60+- mile in
the Village of Oxford and the Town of Oxford. (c) CR 35. The eastbound and westbound
roadways of CR 35, between Route 220 and Route 8, a distance of 13.8+- miles in
the Towns of Oxford and Guilford. (d) Route 8. Route 8 between the

Otsego/Chenango county line and the Chenango/Otsego county line, in the Towns
of Bainbridge, Guilford, Norwich and New Berlin. (e) Route 12. Route 12 between Borden Avenue
and the Chenango County/Madison county line in the City of Norwich, Towns of

Norwich, North Norwich, Sherburne, and the Village of Sherburne. (f) Route 12. Route 12 between the

Broome/Chenango county line and the northerly Route 220 intersection with Route
12 in the Towns of Greene and Oxford, Village of Greene, and the Village of

Oxford. (g) Route 8. Route 8
between the Otsego/Chenango county line and the Chenango/Madison county line in
the Towns of New Berlin and Columbus and the Village of New Berlin. (h) Route 23. Route 23 between the

Otsego/Chenango county line and Route 990L/CR 32, in the Towns of New Berlin
and Norwich. (i) Route 23. Route 23
between CR 44 and the Cortland county line in the Towns of Pharsalia, Pitcher
and Plymouth. (j) CR 44. CR 44
between Route 12 and Route 23 in the Towns of North Norwich and

Plymouth. (k) Route 206. Route 206
between CR 39 and Route 41 in the Towns of Coventry, Bainbridge, and the

Village of Bainbridge. (l) Route
41. Route 41 between Route 206 and Route 12 in the Towns of Coventry, Greene
and the Village of Greene. (m) Route 206. Route 206 between Route 12 and the Broome/Chenango county line in
the Town of Greene and the Village of Greene. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8108.00

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
